alert.note: Alert for Banks; Clarke; Jackson; Madison; Oglethorpe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 10:09PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Oconee, northern Barrow, southeastern Banks, Clarke, Jackson, Oglethorpe and Madison Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1009 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Hoschton to near Victoria Bryant State Park, and moving southeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Winder, Jefferson, Commerce, Watkinsville, Danielsville, Lexington, Athens, Braselton, Statham, Arcade, Nicholson, Hoschton, Comer, Winterville, Bogart, Crawford, Colbert, Pendergrass, Arnoldsville and Ila. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
